segments.text: I can’t stand how careless that woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, letting water flood the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids! Stealing cookies like that, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and she won’t even notice until he’s crying on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is a slip hazard, and she’s just standing in it like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’ll blame the kids when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be ruined because she can’t pay attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’ve never seen someone so oblivious in my life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as bad, encouraging him to take those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
